title: Apsara Kundan Haaram: A Touch of Celestial Elegance
materials: meticulously crafted with high-quality Kundan settings. The necklace features dazzling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones that mimic the brilliance of Polki diamonds. Central pendant showcases a vibrant Emerald cabochon flanked by delicate Rubies. Hyderabadi Polish lends a rich
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic mango (paisley) motif, arranged in an elegant cascading design. The Kundan settings, crafted with meticulous precision, amplify the brilliance of the CZ stones. The central pendant is a masterpiece, featuring an intricate floral design with the Emerald cabochon at its heart. The traditional design is elevated with modern setting techniques for enhanced durability and shine.
colors: Predominantly gold with the sparkling white of the CZ stones. The Emerald and Ruby accents provide a touch of contrasting color
adding depth and richness to the design.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi
and traditional ceremonies such as Seemantham or Half-Saree Functions. Its timeless elegance also makes it suitable for upscale social events and gatherings.
description: This Apsara Kundan Haaram blends traditional Telugu design with modern craftsmanship. The dazzling CZ stones offer a luxurious look without compromising on affordability. The intricate Kundan work and the vibrant gemstone accents create a piece that is both timeless and eye-catching. It's a statement piece that embodies the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad, ensuring you stand out with grace and sophistication. The durable construction and secure settings ensure this Haaram will be a cherished heirloom for generations.
